      • AttackMap

        public void AttackMap(Player player,
                      Country country)
        AttackMap is printing adjacencies of the specific country that player wants to attack with and excludes countries that are his/her from the list.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to attack.
        country - The country that the player has chosen to attack with.

      • MoveMap

        public void MoveMap(Player player,

        MoveMap is printing adjacencies of the specific country that player wants to move with and excludes countries that are not his/her from the list.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to move.
        country - The country that the player has chosen to move with.

        Returns:

      • Competition

        public static int Competition(int NumAttacker,
                              int NumDefender)
        Competition method will do the fighting between two players and show the result step by step.
        Parameters:
        NumAttacker - number of armies the attacker has at his disposal for the fight.
        NumDefender - number of armies the defender has at his disposal for the fight.
        Returns:
        StatusFight return the result of the game that who wins.
